div.h3: Reviews created for v_ranah for sprint Derry 3
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-1987:Fixed Selenium nightly failed tests
FAB-6340 Bug fix Info message should not be displayed when manager job end date is not specified
FAB-6621: Validation is not necessary when MTI is set to Does Not Apply.
FAB-1987 : Fixed Selenium Nightly Failed test for Employee Hierarchy
FAB-6567 Remove framework related Info message while overriding Eligibility Result Page
FAB-6566 Remove framework related Info message for Manage Overdue Evidence page
FAB-6607 Introduced new doamin instances for time decision status and reason
FAB-6607 Added the subset ManageTimeDecisionStatus
FAB-6654: Performance improvement of auto evaluation of Decision Days - related to MTI
FAB-6629 - Warning if Decision Reason not specified (UI)
FAB-6463 : Selenium Re factoring for Update Availability Decision status from Allowed to Time Available
FAB-6458 : Selenium Re factoring for Auto Adjudication Decision set to \'Time Available\' and Reason to blank
FAB-6645 Web layer modifications for Override EligibilityResult page to implement FDP-4985 Solution
FAB-6644 Display message when deny decision is selected and reason is please select
FAB-6639 Code refactoring based on TimeDecisionStatus enum changes to include TimeAvailable
FAB-6607 Fixed the subset issue for \'Time Available\' and modified the subset name to ManualTimeAvailable
FAB-6472 Consider both \'Approved\' and \'Time Available\' Days while calculating Projected Balance
FAB-6670 Use subset to display Pending, Time available and Denied in Manage time
FAB-6640 Re factor method names to removed Allowed and include Time Available
FAB-6662 Update info message for AC-04
FAB-6646 - Update service layer to update DecisionDay status and reason
FAB-6692 Modify the implementation to refresh the Decision Reason drop down based on change of Decision Status.
FAB-6728 Update the code for available balance calculation to consider Approved days instead of Time Available
FAB-6735 - Check if the Selected leave Plan\'s Eligibility Status is not Partially Met before doing auto evaluation of decision days.
FAB-6760 - Format the Date displayed in the Manual Intervention Task Description, to display Date without time.
FAB-6738 : Availability Decision Reason Validation on Manual Evaluation of Availability
FAB-6700:Selenium test to evaluate AutoDecision For manually Approved Leave Request
FAB-6743 Refresh the code to display the updated selected leave plans status
